title: Three men stabbed to death named as police charge 32-year-old
text:
Three murdered men and their alleged attacker have been named by Essex Police (Picture: PA)

A 32-year-old man has today been charged following a brutal triple murder in Colchester.

Tom Saunders was arrested on Sunday in connection with the incident, which saw three other local men in their 30s die from multiple stab wounds, Essex Police said.

The force say ten areas in the town are being treated as crime scenes but described the murders as an ‘isolated incident’ and ‘not related’ to gangs or drug use.

Two victims – brothers 35-year-old Danny Gibson and 31-year-old Jason Gibson – were found inside a property in Wellesley Road during the early hours of Sunday.

A third man, Richard Booth, 35, was discovered inside a car in nearby Hospital Road. All three, and the alleged attacker, are from Colchester and ‘well known to each other’.

A police cordon in Colchester, Essex (Picture: PA)

Police attend the scene of the incident. Two of the men were found in a property, the other in a car (Picture: @AdamRoxby/PA Wire)

The men were ‘well known to each other’, with all the victims dying from stab wounds, police said (Picture: @AdamRoxby/PA Wire)

Police have now named all four men involved (Picture: @AdamRoxby/PA Wire)

Yesterday, post-mortem examinations confirmed that they died after being stabbed repeatedly.

Detectives are continuing their investigation and a police cordon remains in place while specialist teams search the areas being treated as crime scenes.

Colchester district commander, Chief Inspector Rob Huddleston, explained: ‘We continue to investigate the circumstances surrounding these tragic deaths.

‘This incident has left our community shocked and saddened.

‘We are treating it as a targeted and isolated incident. Those involved were well known to each other and we do not believe it was linked to any gang-related crime or drug use.’

He continued: ‘Colchester is a safe place to live, work and socialise and we will continue to work with our partners to ensure this continues.’

Alleged attacker Saunders is due to appear at Colchester Magistrates’ Court later.

description: Essex Police name Danny Gibson, Jason Gibson and Richard Booth as stabbing victims, as Tom Saunders is charged with three counts of murder.
